ModMetaData.name: Farming Breakup
ModMetaData.author: br410bury
ModMetaData.description:
Break growing and cutting tasks into logical sub-units.
Breaks up and modifies the 'Growing' and 'Plant cut' work types in the following manner:
• Renamed Growing task to Sowing. • Moves harvesting task to a new work type called Harvest. • Reprioritized Plant cut to be next to Sowing and Harvesting
1: These are not moved out of the "Construction" work type so a pawn set to construct will also deliver items to construction projects as needed as well).
